name: World Music Day: Girish and The Chronicles Live
about: Don't miss out on the chance to catch Girish and the Chronicles live in action, as they bring their electrifying Indian rock sound to the stage. With a history of sharing the spotlight with renowned international acts and a recent opening performance for Guns N' Roses, this is a party you won't want to miss for an unforgettable night of music and energy.

location.name: Hard Rock Cafe, St Marks Rd - Bengaluru

address.streetAddress: 40, St Marks Rd, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
